Class Level

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
break_out.model.Level
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Level
extends java.lang.Thread
This class contains information about the running game
Author:
dmlux, modified by Nele Meyer and Drenusha Emrulahu, I. Schumacher
